message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $22,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, and this price reflects its true value.
I appreciate your offer, but I think the price is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $18,000 for the product. I believe it's a great deal for both of us.

Bob, I understand your perspective. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $18,000 is lower than I can go. How about we meet in the middle at $20,000? I'm confident you'll find it's a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $17,500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.
